created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

duration_millis.description: The duration of the recording transcription in milliseconds.

recording_id.description: Uniquely identifies the recording associated with this transcription.

status.description: The status of the recording transcriptions. The transcription text will be available only when the status is completed.

transcription_text.example: Good morning, how may I help you?

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
